title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing perfume in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen for good and evil

preview.html: Today we show you the interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream in detail. In this article, God Almighty said: “O leaders, benefit me from my dreams if you are a vision. Which we are showing you today below in the encyclopedia, follow us. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that perfume in a dream symbolizes the good reputation that a person leaves after leaving a place or the world. If one sees in a dream that he is using perfume,; This vision indicates that he will have a good and happy life, and that he will reach all his goals. If he sees that he is buying perfume; This vision symbolizes that he will earn a lot of money in the coming period. Seeing the patient spraying perfume on his clothes. This vision expresses that he will recover from his illness as quickly as possible. Seeing a man carrying perfume in his pocket means that he will get the next good thing in the fortuneteller’s life. If you see perfume flowing on the ground? This vision symbolizes the loss of important things for this person. Seeing a broken perfume bottle in a dream indicates that this person will follow desires and sins and will face a serious problem. It is an auspicious dream to dream of the smell of saffron, as it is a sign that something is happening that makes the dreamer happy. Perfume in a dream According to Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Shaheen believes that perfume in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s marriage if he is single, his success if he is a student, finding a job if he is not working, and his promotion if he is an employee. Perfume in a dream also symbolizes the good deeds that the dreamer does to benefit people, and it also symbolizes To good qualities such as adhering to the truth and courage. If the dreamer desires to travel in reality and sees in his dream that he obtained a bottle of perfume, then his vision indicates that he will be able to travel. Whoever sees in his dream that he smells perfume, this means that he is spreading love and affection to people and benefits others with his knowledge. If you dream that you smell perfume, this foretells its owner that he will soon hear happy news that will change the course of his life. Among the ominous dreams is a dream that smells bad, and it is a sign of the dreamer’s deviation from established traditions and may be a sign that the dreamer has heard news. Sad. Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. The scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi says that perfume in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer lives a good and wealthy life. If a person dreams of the smell of amber, this dream indicates that he earns his living through legitimate means. Dreaming of the smell of an old woman indicates that the dreamer will obtain There are many benefits, and if the dreamer is single, then this vision indicates his marriage to a beautiful girl. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a career in making perfumes, his vision indicates that he will succeed in his work. This vision may indicate that the dreamer does many good deeds without He expects anything in return. One of the most promising visions is a dream of perfuming clothes with perfume, as it indicates that the dreamer will soon gain material benefits, and if he is poor, then the dream is good news of his wealth. When a person sees in his dream that he is perfuming his face with scent, this means that he is fasting to get closer to God. The Almighty. What does perfume mean in a dream for

title: Seeing someone else killing a snake in a dream

preview.html: It raises questions and passion in the viewer, urging him to search for an interpretation of the vision and its meaning. The interpretation of visions varies according to the social status of the viewer, and we will know from our website an explanation of that. In detail through the following article. Interpretation of seeing another person killing a snake in a dream for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees someone known to her killing a snake in a dream. This dream was a sign that this person is facing problems, difficulties and crises in his life. He will also be able and his life will improve soon. God willing, but he needs to be very patient. Another person killing a snake in one girl’s dream. It can indicate the girl’s bright future full of happiness and the fulfillment of aspirations, desires and dreams, God willing. While a person who kills a snake in a dream indicates the presence of close people. This The person is deceitful and cunning in his life, trying to plan schemes and misfortunes for himself. And he will be able to get rid of them soon, God willing. An unmarried girl saw someone killing a snake in a dream, and that person was her father. This dream is an indication of the approaching date of her engagement, God willing. Whereas if he was the girl’s brother He is the one who killed the snake in the dream. This vision is an indication that the brother will cut ties with his family and problems and disagreements will arise between them. Which will lead to his parents being unjust, and God knows best. If the unmarried girl’s mother is the one who kills the snake in the dream. This was a sign of Moving and the girl was exposed to adversity and crises. As well as difficulties, whether professionally or educationally. Also, the killing of a snake by another person in an unmarried girl’s dream also indicates that she will suffer from feasting and envy. She may have some people in her life who hate her. They also wish that it would go away. The blessings in which she lives, and for her condition to deteriorate, and she must avoid it or be careful to deal with it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in a dream according to Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing another person killing a snake in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees that her husband kills a snake in a dream. This was The dream is a sign that he was directing her to face some problems, crises, and difficulties. This dream also shows that her husband has a strong and responsible personality. He also tries to make his family happy, take care of them, and achieve stability for them. The husband killed a snake in a married woman’s dream. In the presence of deceivers and evil people in his life, and he can get rid of Of them, God willing. This dream can also be good news that a married woman will become pregnant in the near future, God willing. When a married woman sees her father killing a snake in a dream. This is an indication that she will be able to overcome the difficulties and crises she is facing in the current period by taking her leave and she must To ask for God’s help and patience. A married woman sees someone killing a snake in a dream. The dream is an indication that this person is going through crises, problems, and difficulties that are hindering his life. He also needs someone to support him psychologically, to be able to solve them and get rid of them, God willing. Interpretation of seeing another person killing a snake In a dream for a man and its meaning when he sees

title: What is the interpretation of a man who sees a single woman in a dream and different situations?

preview.html: Today we will present to you seeing a man in a dream for a single woman and various other situations such as marriage and pregnant women. Seeing a man in a dream for a single girl is a dream. To see a man in a dream symbolizes happiness, optimism and hope, and if the man has an attractive and handsome appearance, this has many connotations. The interpretation of seeing a man in a dream varies depending on his appearance and social status, and it is good news in the dream. Therefore, today we present to you seeing a man in a dream about an unmarried woman and his looking at her with admiration and seeing an unknown man in a dream, in an encyclopedia through the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a man in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees a man in her dream, this indicates abundance of sustenance, and goodness. Which this girl will get, and if the man has a beautiful and attractive appearance, this means that she will receive joy and happiness. If an unmarried girl sees a man in her dream wearing hidden clothing, this means that the year will be happy for her and full of joy and happiness. But if a woman sees a barefoot man Feet in her dream, this indicates that this year will be full of problems, worries, and sorrows. If an unmarried girl sees a skinny man in her dream, this means that that year will be full of problems and crises. But if an unmarried girl sees a man hitting her in her dream and does not feel With pain from him, this indicates that she will get married soon or will be engaged soon. If an unmarried girl sees a man eating food in her dream, this means that she will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing a man in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees a familiar man in his dream, this indicates that this man wants something from him. Seeing a man in a dream, especially if he is a handsome man, means that the dreamer will enter a new life full of nourishment and kindness. But if one sees in a dream someone in a bad mood, this indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems, worries, and sorrows. If he sees If a person sees a naked man in a dream, this indicates illness and serious diseases. But if a person sees in a dream that he is trying to cover up his faults, this indicates that he is trying to correct his mistakes and shortcomings and is trying to get closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a man’s dream in a dream of a married womanIf a married woman sees in Her dream of a strange man entering her house, eating her food, and sitting on her bed, means that that year will be full of stability, happiness, and goodness in her married life. If a married woman dreams of a man with torn clothes or bad manners, it means that that year will be sad and full of sadness for that woman. But If a married woman sees an angry man in her dream, it means that the husband of that woman will get a lot of money and a lot of sustenance, but after a lot of trouble. If she sees a sick woman in her dream, it means that she will face many difficulties and problems in her married life. Interpretation A man dreams of a pregnant woman in a dream. If a married woman sees in her dream a handsome man with an attractive appearance, this means that her birth will be easy and easy, and that she will give birth to a male or female

title: Interpretation of a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a snake in a dream. Interpreters differed in their interpretation of the snake in a dream. Some see in its presence something bad that brings misery to its owner, others see that it shows something good, such as earning money or high positions. Interpretation of a snake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen saw that seeing a snake or snake It indicates the presence of a cunning enemy for the dreamer. As for whoever sees that he killed a snake or a snake in a dream, he will be able to confront his enemy in reality and defeat him crushingly, but if he kills the snake and throws it with his hand, then it indicates victory over the enemies and the taking of all their money and wealth. But if The dreamer saw that his words were alive with good and kind words, then this indicates the appearance of goodness and benefit. Whoever sees a snake made of metal, it is good, and if it is made of gold or silver, then it is better. Interpretation of seeing a snake by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a snake in a dream is considered one of the most important interpretations that many interpreters have explained. Ibn Sirin believes that the snake is an enemy, and that the large number of snakes expresses the large number of enemies, because Satan brought them to our master Adam and was able to enter Paradise. He also believes that the amount of hostility for each snake varies according to its shape, the strength of its bones, and its thickness. He also believes that snakes indicate infidels, adulterers, and murderers. Because murderers often kill with snake venom. The snake can be evidence that it is the power and status of the dreamer, or it can be a wife and son. The Qur’an also describes women and children who can be enemies of the man in many cases. It is also seen that whoever fights the snake Or he argued with her in his dream, this indicates that he succeeded in defeating his enemy. He also sees that eating a snake in a dream shows good things that will happen to a person and opportunities to obtain them. A lot of money, prestige, and pleasure in his life, but if the dreamer cuts the snake into two equal or unequal halves, he can triumph over his enemies. As for his lively speech with kind and gentle words, this indicates people’s love for the dreamer and their admiration for his deeds and deeds. However, if a person sees the snake while it is dead, this indicates Against the most powerful and cruelest enemies. Hate and hatred, and seeing snakes killed and slaughtered in places of buying and selling, this indicates the emergence of war and victory over enemies. Interpretation of seeing a smooth snakeThe interpretation of a snake in a dream will differ from one interpreter to another, due to the different shapes of snakes. If one sees a large black snake, this means that the dreamer He will lead deadly armies. If the snake is soft and calm and does not harm him, this indicates that he has obtained one of the treasures of kings. As for whoever sees a snake and is afraid of it and does not look at it from the base to know, its appearance indicates that he is safe from his enemy. And if he sees the snake emerging from a stream Urine, this indicates the imminent birth of a new baby from the family. Interpretation of seeing a descending snake in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. Al-Nabulsi believes that if the dreamer sees a snake descending from a high place, this indicates the death of the head of that place. As for the dreamer’s vision of his garden full of snakes, the orchard growing, and the plants thriving And grow, either

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking in a cemetery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking through graves in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about walking through graves in a dream, one of the dreams is very disturbing, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must prevent absolute disbelief, because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth , and that he makes mistakes and can be injured, except that the site and its managers have no input. For interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about walking in a cemetery in a dream. Anyone who dreams of walking in a cemetery can be a sign of the bad psychological state that a friend is exposed to during that period. Walking in a cemetery in a dream can be a sign of unhappy things that happen to the dreamer in those days. In In the event that someone saw that he was walking in the cemetery, this may be a sign of a material loss that the dreamer may suffer in those days. If someone sees in his dream that he is walking among the graves, this may be a sign of some sadness and sorrow that the dreamer felt in that. Time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of walking on broken glass in a dream: A dream of walking on a glass may indicate that the dreamer suffered from a major problem during this period. In the event that someone saw that he was walking on glass, this may indicate the bad reality that he is suffering from. Among them is the dreamer at that time. The dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that you discover a mistake made by someone during this time. A person’s dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that some people deceived him and manipulated him in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of walking on broken glass Agricultural land in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is walking on agricultural land, could be a sign of blessings and goodness that will come his way during that time. Walking on agricultural land in a dream can be a sign of the dreamer’s good behavior and morals. Whoever dreams that they walked on agricultural land It may indicate the abundance of sustenance and money that will come to them in the coming period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that he is walking on agricultural land, this may be an indication of the positive changes that are occurring in your life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on Zamzam water in a dream: If one sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this may indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations in the coming period, thanks to God. Walking in Zamzam water in a dream may be a sign of recovery from diseases that the dreamer suffered from in the previous period. If one sees That he is walking on Zamzam water, this may be a sign of the end of the worry and sorrow that the dreamer faced in his life at that time, thanks to God. If a person sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this indicates the abundance of livelihood and broad satisfaction that the dreamer will gain at this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on my knees in a dream: If a person sees that he is walking on his knees, this may indicate the distress that the dreamer is going through in those days. Walking on his knees in a dream may be a sign of a crisis that the dreamer is going through during this time. If one sees that he was Walking on his knees, he was lost

title: Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream. A towel is considered one of the almost daily uses of a person. Knowing the meaning of this dream and its interpretation, he begins to search for interpretations, so in this article today we will learn together, the interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a towel in a dreamDear reader, we will guide you. To shed light on the interpretations given to see a towel, it is a symbol of cleanliness in real life. The dream and what it leads to in reality we explain below: Scientists indicate that seeing the symbol of a towel in a dream symbolizes a number of interpretations that contribute to the circumstances of the dream and how it is used in different meanings and symbols. Seeing buying a towel in the dreamer’s dream indicates this. The changes that occur in the dreamer's life, in reality, are a symbol of new changes entering a sign and may indicate a change for the better in a short period of time, and God knows the unseen. Seeing buying a towel in a dream symbolizes the dreamer. He took a new job and settled on earth, and only God knows the unseen. The interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream for a married woman is interpreted as follows: The time of her happiness and stability in reality is approaching, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a blue towel in a dream What are the interpretations that came to interpret the towel Blue in a dream for different situations. Is it considered a good vision or a vision that does not bode well? We confirm this in our article through the following lines: Seeing a blue towel in a dream symbolizes warning and warning against anger and emotions in situations that require wisdom, reason, patience and prudence, because anger in anger is a great evil that can bring him something that does not benefit him, and anger and lack of dreaminess are also qualities. Inherent that a person should not have. Patience is everything beautiful that comes and every problem is solved by His command, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a blue towel in a dream means: the trials that he must go through. God Almighty tests the servant against the challenges, conflicts and problems that he falls into, as he must constantly face these problems with kindness and wisdom and not recklessness. reality. God knows best. Seeing a towel is a promising vision. It symbolizes the good son, the good deed, and the terrible kindness of the pioneer, the unmarried person, who is as righteous and steadfast as he wants, as well as the married woman and the man. As for the pregnant woman: he is a happy male son whose eyes are pleasing to him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a Bashkir in a dream for a single woman: Every girl dreams of starting to realize her dreams. Finding a job that matches the nature of the idea, her inclinations, and her studies, in addition to her desire to be a good husband who shares the journey of climbing, building, and work, and thus a happy family and good children. Therefore, the dreamer searches in her dream for hints and advice that symbolize the happiness of her date, wanting to know what lies behind this vision of interpretations and symbols in her dream, to wonder about the most important thing mentioned in the dream. Seeing a towel in addition to seeing a bathrobe in a dream, and what about these meanings that they bring to their folds, is it praiseworthy or not, this is what we consider below: The beautiful girl

title: The meaning of blood in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of blood in a dream Seeing blood in a dream is a disturbing, interesting and disturbing vision. The dreamer of this dream quickly knows the meaning of blood in the dream, the interpretation of this dream, and its repercussions. Seeing blood in a dream is also a dream that receives great attention in the science of dream interpretation. Similar to this article from the site Various, we will explain the meaning of blood in a dream to the leading imams and scholars of dream interpretation. The meaning of blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin is considered the most famous dream interpreter, who explained the meaning of blood in a dream in detail and explained all the connotations and signs that this dream carries. Among the interpretations of Ibn Sirin in interpreting the meaning of blood in a dream: Seeing blood in a dream means that the dreamer will commit many sins, disobedience and mistakes in his life, and the dream also shows forbidden money. If the sleeper sees blood flowing from his body, this is a warning that he will lose a lot of money and die. . Also, seeing blood flowing from the dreamer’s veins, the interpretation of the dream is not good. But if blood is flowing from the sleeper’s face, it means that this person is earning money from illegal things and earning illegal money. While you see blood flowing between the dreamer’s teeth, the interpretation This is that dreaming people are exposed to many difficulties and problems. Seeing a few drops of blood on the fortuneteller’s clothes, this explains the sleeper’s hypocrisy and hypocrisy towards others in order to achieve his goals. But seeing yourself rolling in a place with a lot of blood explains this as obtaining a lot of money. Seeing hot blood with a foul smell symbolizes committing sins and transgressions. As Ibn Sirin mentions in his explanation of the meaning of blood in a dream, when you see yourself swimming in a river with blood in a dream, this vision is evidence that you are earning large sums of forbidden money and being unable to get rid of them. Seeing a hand Stained with blood in a dream means that you will earn forbidden money, but the dreamer can dispose of it and benefit others with it. Seeing blood coming out of the arteries indicates extreme poverty or sadness due to the loss of a loved one. Seeing blood in a dream comes from another person, but when one dreams that his car overturns Or you are exposed to a tragic accident and bleed from it in the dream, then this is interpreted as disappointment. During the interpretation of the meaning of blood in a dream, when blood comes out of the dreamer’s eye, it means the dreamer’s bad morals and his interference in the private lives of others and spying on those around him. As stated in the previous interpretation The dream is a sign of the dreamer’s extreme sadness and crying because one of his parents was suffering from a serious illness. The blood flowing from the head in the dream also symbolizes the dreamer’s disobedience and distance from Almighty God. The dream also shows many problems that the dreamer will face, but he will be able to overcome them, God willing. One of the interpretations of blood coming from the head in a dream is that this indicates the many conflicts that the dreamer will find with himself and the fears that will afflict him in the coming days. Blood coming out of the head in a dream can indicate The head also indicates bad and illegal thoughts that the dreamer is thinking and working to get a lot of money. Seeing blood in the dream comes out m

title: The 11 most popular interpretations of seeing a ship in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream? It indicates prosperity and goodness. The meaning of a man seeing a broken ship in a dream? It indicates some problems that he is going through in his life. What is the interpretation of a man who sees that he is in a ship full of people? It indicates the safety of the journey. Interpretation Seeing a boat trip in a bachelor’s dream? Details of his wedding soon. What is the interpretation of seeing a ship sinking in a dream? Rate of career failure. Interpretation of a dream about a ship by Ibn Sirin. A ship in a dream shows wealth and kindness. Then a ship in a dream can be a release from some of the fears and problems that he is experiencing. Dreamer. A dream about a ship indicates distress and sadness. Whoever sees in a dream that he died on a ship while in the water, this means that he will die in the hands of men. Then seeing a person in a dream on a ship full of people, this indicates the safety of his journey. After that, Seeing a large ship on the water indicates abundant sustenance and gaining money. Seeing a dream about a ship for a man. If someone sees that he is crossing the ship, this indicates that he will be affected by it. If a man sees a broken ship in a dream, this indicates some problems that he is going through in his life. Then, when you see a man in a dream that he cannot sail the ship, it means that he will be imprisoned and suffer. Seeing a ship running with blood is evidence of adultery. If one sees in a dream a ship that was wrecked and scattered everywhere, this indicates the death of a nation. Interpretation of a dream about a ship For unmarried women, seeing one girl on a ship in a dream indicates that she is very strong and self-confident. Then seeing an unmarried woman on a ship, this is evidence of achieving goals and fulfilling all her desires. A ship in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of travel. Seeing a dream about a ship for a woman Married: A steamboat in a married woman’s dream indicates kindness and blessing. Seeing a ship in a dream for a married woman indicates stability and psychological peace. Seeing a steamboat can be a sign of positive change in her life and the life of her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a ship for a pregnant woman: The ship is evidence of the safety and security of the fetus. A steamboat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will get rid of the fatigue and problems of pregnancy. Then, seeing a ship in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that childbirth is near and that it will pass well and safely. Seeing a dream about a ship from NablusRiding a boat in a dream is a sign of success and happiness. So, the Seeing a single person riding a boat in a dream is evidence of his marriage in the near future. Driving a ship in a dream is generally a sign of marriage. So, seeing a ship sinking in a dream is a sign of failure in business. A ship sinking in a dream could be a sign To fall into disobedience and sins. A shipwreck can indicate illness and trouble.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake in the house

preview.html: If an earthquake occurs and the people of this house survive, this indicates that they have gotten rid of problems in their lives, and God is Great and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing an earthquake in the house in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she feels an earthquake in the house and that the ground beneath her is shaking with great force in a dream. It is It indicates that she will live with some major disagreements in her home with those close to her now, and God knows best. As for seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, she is looking at the earthquake that occurred in the house, and the house was collapsing from the force of the earthquake in the dream. This is an indication that she will suffer from Great harm in the coming period of her life and it will affect her greatly. Also, the only girl who dreams that there is a slight earthquake in the dream, and it does not affect the house in any way in the dream. It shows that she will face difficult things in her life, but she was able to get through them without any negative impact. On her. And the only dreaming girl who sees that she sees an earthquake in a dream, and tries to stop her status in the dream. A sign of suffering in the life of an unmarried woman that she will be freed from in the next period of her life, God willing. See also: Seeing the demolition of buildings in a dream. Interpretation of watching an earthquake in the house in a dream For a married woman: If a divorced woman dreams that there is a large earthquake in the dream, shaking her house a lot in the dream, and she feels afraid. This indicates that many things happened in her life during this time that made her very sad and upset, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. What if a married woman saw the earthquake in the dream? She felt its power in the dream, but she tried to hold still in the dream. She explains that she is going through a major crisis in her life at the present time and is trying not to leave it a negative impact on her life. A married woman sees in a dream the earthquake that hits her house with great force and leads to its demolition. This is an indication that This married woman will live in major disagreements with her husband in the coming periods. As for the married woman who sees that she feels an earthquake in a dream, and it was very light in the dream, this did not affect her in the dream. This indicates that there are problems that she is going through in her life, but she will succeed. In getting rid of them in the coming period, God willing. Interpretation of seeing an earthquake in the house in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that a strong earthquake destroyed her house in a dream and did not harm her in the dream. This indicates that she is suffering a lot in this period after her divorce, and that she is living a very difficult time. God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Seeing a divorced woman looking at an earthquake in a dream, and trying to hold still in the dream so that no harm will befall her. This is a sign that this divorced woman is living in a dilemma with her family at this time, but she will get rid of it. And when she saw the divorced woman sitting in her house, he came to her. A very strong and strong earthquake in her dream and it was faint. It explains that this divorced woman will look at the difficult matters in her life and try to overcome them and end them. And if the divorced woman sees in a dream a strong earthquake, and it often hits her house in a dream, and she does not care. It shows that he will end up sad, And very big things he was going through in Fatt

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating guava in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of eating guava in a dream In the following lines, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream of eating guava in a dream and what it brings, whether it is good or bad, all this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream of eating guava in a dream Interpretation of dreams Eating guava in a dream can be a sign of stability, and God knows the unseen. However, if a married man is seen eating a spoiled guava, this may lead to corruption of religion and morals, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen eating guava, this may be good and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a yellow guava, it may indicate forbidden money or illness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing Interpretation of a dream of cutting guava in a dream Interpretation of a dream of cutting guava in a dream Seeing guava can indicate stability, and God knows the unseen Seeing guava can also express comfort, and God knows the unseen When you see a good guava, it may be a sign of wisdom and reason that God has given to the owner of the dream, and God knows best If a married man sees a guava that is not good, this may indicate gossip, and God knows the unseen Interpretation of a dream of peeling a banana in a dream Interpretation of a dream of peeling a banana in a dream can be a sign of strength and violence from a person, and God knows best Know when a single girl sees a peeled banana, this can lead to a violent and strong love story, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself in a dream peeling a banana, this may be evidence of success, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Seeing peeling a banana can also indicate goodness and livelihood, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about rotten bananas Interpretation of a dream about rotten bananas in a dream can be a sign of a bad reputation, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a man sees a rotten banana, it may be a sign of badness, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When you see a rotten banana, this indicates his loss, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a rotten banana in a dream, this may be an indication of a job that he does not like, but he does it compulsorily, and God is Most High and All-Knowing Interpretation of a dream about a person eating a banana in a dream Interpretation of dreams about a person eating a banana in a dream Eating a banana can indicate goodness and care, God willing. And in the case of seeing a married woman eating a banana, this may lead to healing, and God knows the unseen When seeing eating a banana, it may indicate commitment to duties and worship, and God Almighty is over everything. If a young man is seen eating a banana, this may indicate goodness and care, and God knows the unseen Interpretation of a dream about picking berries from a tree in Dream Interpretation of a dream about picking berries from a tree in a dream can be a sign of affection, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. If a young man sees a mulberry tree, it may be a sign of money and livelihood, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. If an unmarried girl sees a mulberry tree, it may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best.
